pages.title: ℧ Seven of Cups ℧
pages.text: Spirit of Illusionary Success$(br)     ♀ Venus in ♏ Scorpio

Strange chalices of vision appear above a cloud, like a headdress of dreams.$(br)  A shadowed figure wonders at them from below.$(br)  Though the cups line up just as formally, their place above their witness gives them a much more dynamic quality - the dynamism of art and inspiration.$(br)  This mysterious quality of the card matches its traditional theme, that of fantasy, or illusion.$(br)  Myth, dreams and art are not

the ultimate reality, but they are a representation of it, an intuition of truth behind the mask of mystery. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Inspiration, fantasies, mystery, dreams. Strange and captivating ideas.$(br)  May also mean masking our true feelings.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Realism, planning what needs to be done, willing dreams into action.
